A Goat is an animal found in the Kharidian Desert south of Al-Kharid. They drop horns used in Herblore to create Combat potions. The greatest amount of spawns are south-west of the Kalphite lair (accessible via fairy ring BIQ; however, the goats near Nardah are much closer to a bank.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 Trivia
  • 5 See also

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
North of Pollnivneach236Maplink
North of Sophanem234Maplink
North-west of Uzer (near the mine)234Maplink
South-west of the Kalphite Lair (BIQ)235Maplink
West of Nardah235Maplink
South of the Ruins of Unkah234Maplink

Drops[edit | edit source]

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always690
Desert goat horn1Always557

Note that after completing the easy set of the desert diary, the desert horn will always be dropped as a note rather than the actual item.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 March 2015
(update | poll)

Goats now drop desert goat horns in noted form if you have completed the Desert Easy Diary.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Since 'Billy' goats, the male of species, are a different creature, all 'goats' are doe or nannies, the females. The images support this idea, as the billy is larger than the nanny, a common sexual dimorphism trait among many mammal species.

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Billy goat
  • Mountain goat
  • Desert goat horn
  • Goat horn dust

A '''Goat''' is an animal found in the [[Kharidian Desert]] south of [[Al-Kharid]]. They drop horns used in [[Herblore]] to create [[Combat potion]]s. The greatest amount of spawns are south-west of the [[Kalphite lair]] (accessible via [[fairy ring]] {{Fairycode|BIQ}}; however, the goats near [[Nardah]] are much closer to a bank.

==Drops==
===100%===
{{DropsTableHead}}
{{DropsLine|name=Bones|quantity=1|rarity=Always}}
{{DropsLine|name=Desert goat horn|quantity=1|rarity=Always}}
{{DropsTableBottom}}

Note that after completing the easy set of the [[desert diary]], the desert horn will '''always''' be dropped as a note rather than the actual item.

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 5 March 2015
|update = Achievement Diaries
|poll = Old School Achievement Diary Rewards Poll
|change = Goats now drop [[desert goat horn]]s in noted form if you have completed the [[Desert Easy Diary]].
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==Trivia==
*Since 'Billy' goats, the male of species, are a different creature, all 'goats' are doe or nannies, the females. The images support this idea, as the billy is larger than the nanny, a common sexual dimorphism trait among many mammal species.

*[[Goat horn dust]]
